about_the_game:
SKY THE SCRAPER is a rogue-like action adventure centering around the life of Sky, a young man who pursues his uncertain dreams while working as a building window cleaner.

The game offers a deeply personal narrative of Sky's life, including tax and rent struggles, conflicts with unsupportive family members, and his determination to pursue his dreams in the midst of it all.

Can you help navigate Sky toward his bright future that awaits beyond these challenging days?

Thrilling Skyscraper Cleaning Action

Strive to remove as much grime as possible within the time limit for better rewards and scores. Use wire and wall movements for quick, precise cleaning. Remember, frequent wiper cleaning is vital for optimal performance.



If Sky loses his grip, runs off the edge of the building, or collides with birds, he will fall. Falling to the ground ends the day's work and potentially leads to game-over injuries. Safety first!

Ever-changing Challenges

No two job scenes are alike, varying in grime types & layouts, weather, time of day, and obstacles. Always assess and adapt to the situation.


Survive Day by Day

Rent, taxes, medical expenses for injuries...and many other expenses might come out of a small paycheck. If you work too much, you may encounter unexpected accidents. On your days off, enjoy activities or rest to keep your physical and mental condition in good shape!



Upgrade Your Abilities

Enhance your abilities by upgrading your cleaning equipment. As your ambition grows, you can learn new skills with the "Skill Synapse" feature. Build your optimal setup and enhance your performance.


Sky's Relationships and Challenges

Interactions with various characters impact Sky's life. Sometimes, you may have to give up your dream if you can't complete tasks. Try to survive the two-month period until you determine your path by fulfilling requirements such as money, ambition, and trust.

Plenty of Replay Elements

Sky's ending varies depending on how you spend the two months. Depending on the ending reached, new stories, game modes, or player characters with different skill sets may emerge. The world of "SKY THE SCRAPER" expands and deepens the more you play.
